{{cpp/regex/regex_traits/title|value}}
{{cpp/regex/regex_traits/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++11|1=
int value( CharT ch, int radix ) const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Determines the value represented by the digit {{c|ch}} in the numeric base {{c|radix}}, given the currently imbued locale. This function is called by {{lc|std::regex}} when processing [[cpp/regex/ecmascript#Quantifiers|Quantifiers]] such as {{tt|{1}}} or {{tt|{2,5}}}, [[cpp/regex/ecmascript#Backreferences|Backreferences]] such as {{tt|\1}}, and hexadecimal and Unicode character escapes.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ch|the character that may represent a digit}}
{{par|radix|either 8, 10, or 16}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The numeric value if {{c|ch}} indeed represents a digit in the currently imbued locale that is valid for the numeric base {{c|radix}}, or {{c|-1}} on error.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;locale&gt;
#include &lt;map&gt;
#include &lt;regex&gt;

// This custom regex traits allows japanese numerals
struct jnum_traits : std::regex_traits&lt;wchar_t&gt;
{   
    static std::map&lt;wchar_t, int&gt; data;
    int value(wchar_t ch, int radix) const
    {
        wchar_t up = std::toupper(ch, getloc());
        return data.count(up) ? data[up] : regex_traits::value(ch, radix);
    }
};
std::map&lt;wchar_t, int&gt; jnum_traits::data = {{L'〇',0}, {L'一',1}, {L'二',2},
                                            {L'三',3}, {L'四',4}, {L'五',5},
                                            {L'六',6}, {L'七',7}, {L'八',8},
                                            {L'九',9}, {L'Ａ',10}, {L'Ｂ',11},
                                            {L'Ｃ',12}, {L'Ｄ',13}, {L'Ｅ',14},
                                            {L'Ｆ',15}};

int main()
{   
    std::locale::global(std::locale("ja_JP.utf8"));
    std::wcout.sync_with_stdio(false);
    std::wcout.imbue(std::locale());

    std::wstring in = L"風";

    if (std::regex_match(in, std::wregex(L"\\u98a8")))
        std::wcout &lt;&lt; "\\u98a8 matched " &lt;&lt; in &lt;&lt; '\n';

    if (std::regex_match(in, std::basic_regex&lt;wchar_t, jnum_traits&gt;(L"\\u九八ａ八")))
        std::wcout &lt;&lt; L"\\u九八ａ八 with custom traits matched " &lt;&lt; in &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
\u98a8 matched 風
\u九八ａ八 with custom traits matched 風
}}
